import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonCard, IonCardHeader, IonCardTitle, IonCardContent, IonButton, IonModal, IonItem, IonLabel, IonSelect, IonSelectOption, IonGrid, IonRow, IonCol, IonList } from '@ionic/react'; import './Tab1.css'; import { bluetoothComponent } from '../components/BluetoothButton'; let mapStr = "m " function setButtonMapping(data:string) { console.log(data) if(bluetoothComponent.bluetooth_started) { return data } else { alert("Bluetooth connection has not been established!") return data } } const Tab2: React.FC = () => { const [showModal1, setShowModal1] = useState(false); const [showModal2, setShowModal2] = useState(false); const [buttonChoice, setButtonChoice] = useState(); const [modChoice, setModChoice] = useState(); const [animChoice, setAnimChoice] = useState(); return (
Temperature XX°F Humidity YY%

Enter new temperature and humidity preferences

Fans will turn on when conditions inside the helmet exceed these values.

setShowModal1(false)}>Ok setShowModal1(true)} color="success" shape="round" expand="block"> Change temperature & humidity preferences No mod Mod 1 Mod 2 Mods 1 & 2 Button 1 Neutral Cheerful Starry-eyed Excited Button 2 Happy shock Sad shock Teary Bluescreen Button 3 Unimpressed Angry Dead Table flip Button 4 Party Parrot Rickroll The Game This is fine Button setButtonChoice( setButtonMapping(mapStr + e.detail.value) )}> 1 2 3 4 Modifier setModChoice(e.detail.value)}> none 1 2 1 & 2 Animation setAnimChoice(e.detail.value)}> Neutral Cheeful Starry-eyed Excited Happy shock Sad shock Teary Bluescreen Unimpressed Angry Dead Table flip Party Parrot Rickroll The Game This is fine setShowModal2(false)}>Ok setShowModal2(true)} color="success" shape="round" expand="block"> Change animation mapping
); }; export default Tab2;
